project_descr: The objective of the programme is to promote service delivery, socio-economic development and poverty reduction through improved decentralized governance and institutional capacity building at provincial and municipal level.

outputs.output_descr: The objective of the programme is to promote service delivery, socio-economic development and poverty reduction through improved decentralized governance and institutional capacity building at provincial and municipal level.
donor_name: FOOD AND AGRICULTURE ORGANIZATION OF THE

outputs.output_descr: The Project seeks to support the selected municipalities, by motivating local communities and civil society to demand better services and to contribute to the delivery of those services, and also stimulating sustainable local development. The approach recognizes CSOs as key partners in governance and development, and emphasizes the strengthening of linkages to improve citizens’ participation and community mobilization, the identification of priorities in development, contributions from local knowledge bases, and stimulate community driven local development processes towards poverty alleviation
